channel.title: GitHub Makefile Weekly Trending
channel.description: Weekly Trending of Makefile in GitHub

item.title: openwrt/packages
item.description: Community maintained packages for OpenWrt. Documentation for submitting pull requests is in CONTRIBUTING.md

item.title: llm-d/llm-d
item.description: llm-d enables high-performance distributed LLM inference on Kubernetes

item.title: jobbole/awesome-python-cn
item.description: Python资源大全中文版，包括：Web框架、网络爬虫、模板引擎、数据库、数据可视化、图片处理等，由「开源前哨」和「Python开发者」微信公号团队维护更新。

item.title: HaveAGitGat/Tdarr
item.description: Tdarr - Distributed transcode automation using FFmpeg/HandBrake + Audio/Video library analytics + video health checking (Windows, macOS, Linux & Docker)

item.title: manna-harbour/miryoku
item.description: Miryoku is an ergonomic, minimal, orthogonal, and universal keyboard layout.

item.title: open-telemetry/opentelemetry-proto-go
item.description: Generated code for OpenTelemetry protobuf data model

item.title: foostan/crkbd
item.description: Corne keyboard, a split keyboard with 3x6 column staggered keys and 3 thumb keys.

item.title: cloudposse/build-harness
item.description: Collection of Makefiles to facilitate building Golang projects, Dockerfiles, Helm charts, and more
